p: After randomization, follow-up takes place every 3 months during the first 2 years and every 6 months during year 3 to 5. Follow-up CT-scans of the chest and abdomen combined with tumor marker analysis (CA 19–9 and CEA) take place at 6, 12, 18, and 24 months from randomization and yearly thereafter, until disease recurrence or up to a maximum of 5 years after randomization in patients without recurrence.
